title: make kayles E give her range for the next 3 autos instead of one.
body:
would help her laning phase out so she isnt bullied so much without her being able to retaliate.
and for 11 and up since shell already be ranged make her E give her extra range for the next 3 autos

just a thought.

replies.body:
no. do any of you understand that the only way to truly balance this kayle is to give her a trash early game?

the only way to balance her is her power curve. her lategame is so broken, that her early game has to be terrible to make up for it.

its total shit design, but this is what she is now.

she can have a trash early game without being almost unplayable.
{{champion:67}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:75}} have bad early games hell they hit their powerspikes earlier than kayle. kayle gets out did by every. single. champion. in. every. single. role.

>
> she can have a trash early game without being almost unplayable.
> {{champion:67}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:75}} have bad early games hell they hit their powerspikes earlier than kayle. kayle gets out did by every. single. champion. in. every. single. role.

nasus and yi have counterplay, you only ever see them stomp low mmr because nasus still gets kited, and yi is actually short ranged (not vayne "short ranged") and has to fight in melee as a squishy champion, so there is a good chance to blow him up, which makes him garbage in teamfights.

with vayne youre really making my point. she has no right to be as strong as she is right now.

^ this vayne being overpowered doesnt mean kayle should have a strong early especially since her late is arguably better then vaynes and she only need to hit late game to achieve her spike. The onus should be on the player to survive not win. With this kayle winning early is not an option otherwise shes broken

why people are thinking that kayle should be able to retaliate decently in lane? geez

she needs to be shit in early unless you want a second vayne, stop with these "great" ideas about buffing her early without gutting her late

that would work. but yeah like death XIII said it might be a little too powerful to be able to abuse PTA that way. 

I like the idea of it being split into 2 charges instead. 

I really don't like it being an execute, it might as well be another targeted ability.. the fact that it empowers her attack is meaningless.

They really need to rethink her E ability.. 

Like.. just set aside its damage numbers for now.. and think about a fun way to empower her attacks so that she can be half melee half ranged until she hits lvl 11. 
Then when they figure out the perfect method of making her half ranged half melee with her E...THEN they can think about balancing its numbers. 

Before the rework her E was her entire kit, and now it's just another targeted ability... the exact thing Riot is supposed to be straying from.
No. She shouldn’t be able to Proc PTA early game out of melee. Or use Hail of Blades.
